# Monte Carlo Simulations


In the following parts of the lecture, we will use Monte Carlo simulations in oder to check whether a certain estimator like, for instance, the arithmetic mean  
$$
\bar{X}_n=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^nX_i
$$
as an estimator of the population mean value $\mu$.
